title: Beer-elim
html: BEER-ELIM(Beʹer-eʹlim) [Well of the Big Trees].A place named in Isaiah’s pronouncement against Moab. (Isa 15:8) The foretold desolation is to cause “howling” clear to Eglaim and to Beer-elim. The location is unknown; many scholars relate it to Beer, mentioned at Numbers 21:16.—See BEER, I, No. 1.
